channel.title: Command List
channel.description: Ok, i'm co-owner on a server. The owner sent me the entire server file, but I'm going to be coding and updating. There already are: Mod, admin, owner commands. But you would have to look at the .java to know that. Could someone please tell me where and what I would edit to make a command list for: Mods, admins, owners. Thankyou

item.title: Command List
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

We basically gave you full on clues towards the answer…

Read full topic

Guys, I just need to know where and how to make a command list, and the command for it. Just normal players right now. The command will be ::commands and the menu the same. Tell me as i’m a beginner who knows nothing.

Hes asking for a list/menu, not a command,
Make a void, as jordie mentioned, then
Use a command to link it to the void.

item.title: Command List
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“Moo Dragon, post:3, topic:235638”][quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=310750.msg2479787#msg2479787 date=1223467516]
you go into their character file and change their Rights = 0.

Rights = 1 is mod
Rights = 2 is admin
Rights = 3 is Owner/Co-owner.
[/quote]
How the bloody hell did you get that out of this topic
He is asking how to make commands for Moderators+ I think.[/quote]i was tired, that’s my only excuse. sorry, recently you quoted me on some things i guess i wasn’t sure of lol. I should have just went to sleep.

Read full topic

item.title: Command List
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

Oh,K,let,me,help,you.
Roflz. ^^

Here is an example of one;

public void playerMenu() { clearQuestInterface(); for(int i = 0; i < server.playerHandler.maxPlayers; i++) { if(server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { { sendQuest("@dre@Players", 8144); //Title sendQuest("@red@Project",8146); sendQuest("@red@"+server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName, 8147+i); } } } sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }
Now do it yourself =/.

Read full topic

item.title: Command List
item.dc:creator: @barragey0uXD barragey0uXD
item.description:
@barragey0uXD wrote:

To make a command list(viewable in server):
You need to make a command at client.java first, whic opens up a menu like, CommandMenu

After that you must make a menu called CommandMenu or whatever your gonna call it,
then you can post all shit in it.

If this didnt help you then just look for a c&p tut on making it …

Read full topic

item.title: Command List
item.dc:creator: @I_PK_Pigeons I PK Pigeons
item.description:
@I_PK_Pigeons wrote:

actually Johno

else if (command.startsWith("sit") && playerRights >= 1) { pEmote = 2939; }

The playerRights >=1) means if your player rights are 1 or above, the “>” meaning more than

Read full topic

item.title: Command List
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

To add a command for mods/admin/ and owner just make a command in your client.java,

First of all search

if (command(

That will bring up LOADS of commands, then add codes like this

else if (command.startsWith("sit") && playerRights >= 1) {pEmote = 2939; }

This will make a person, with staff level of “1” (mod) sit down, do just edit the

&& playerRights >= 1)

to what ever the player right is

mod = 1
admin/co-owner = 2
owner = 3

Hope this helped,

johno

Read full topic
